title: Udio â€” AI Tool Review
description: Udio is an AI music platform that generates high-quality original music across any genre, with precise control over style, instrumentation, and mood. Udio is Suno's main competitor in AI music generation, known for producing particularly high-fidelity audio with better control over musical style and production. It allows users to extend songs, generate from custom lyrics, and export individual stems. Udio's model is particularly praised for its musicality and production quality compared to other AI music tools. Highlights: Excellent audio quality. Stems export available. Custom lyric input. Song extension feature. Wide genre coverage.
